mapper.insert: insert into cart(user_id, product_id, price, amount, total, created) values(#{userId}, #{productId}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{total}, #{created})
mapper.select: select id, c.user_id as userID, product_id as productId, p.name as productName, c.price, c.amount, c.total, c.created join product p on c.product_id = p.id from cart where user_id=#{userId}
